bridge-type.label: BACnet IP bridge

parameter.name: localNetworkNumber
parameter.description: Identifier of network to which by default this bridge is bound.
parameter.label: Local network number

parameter.name: localDeviceId
parameter.description: Identifier of local device which is visible in BACnet network.
parameter.label: Device identifier

parameter.name: localBindAddress
parameter.description: IP address on which communications to system are expected to take place.
parameter.label: Local address

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port number on which to expect communication. By default 47808 (hex 0xBAC0).
parameter.label: Port number

parameter.name: broadcastAddress
parameter.description: Address used for sending BACnet broadcast messages.
parameter.label: Broadcast address

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between next poll cycles. If no value is given polling is done 1000 ms (every second).
